passages.name: email
passages.text:
<Message>
  OK! Enter you email address below to proceed to your price quote
</Message>

<TextAction placeholder="your.email@here.now"
            mask="Email"
            key="email"
            next="[[NÃ¤sta->youthEligibilityCheck]]"
>
</TextAction>

passages.name: errorSize
passages.text:
<Message>
  Unfortunately, we can only insure homes with a maximum of 6 people
</Message>

<Message>
  If you want to, you can subscribe to our newsletter to be the first to know when we can insure more than 6 people!
</Message>

<SelectAction>
  <Option>
    [[Yes, subscribe to the newsletter->NewsletterSuccess]]
  </Option>
</SelectAction>

passages.name: NewsletterSuccess
passages.text: Double-click this passage to edit it.

passages.name: CreateQuoteError
passages.text: Double-click this passage to edit it.

passages.name: birthDate
passages.text:
<Message>
  What's your birth date?
</Message>

<Response>
  {birthDate}
</Response>

<TextAction placeholder="1996-02-18"
            key="birthDate"
            minvalue="1"
            mask="BirthDate"
            next="[[Continue->numberOfPeople]]"
            unit="birth date (yyyy-mm-dd)"
>
</TextAction>

passages.name: youth
passages.text:
<Message>
  Bonus question! Since you are under 31 years old you are eligible for our youth insurance with a fixed price of XXX kr/mo. What do you say?
</Message>

<SelectAction>
  <Option key="isYouth"
          value="true"
  >
    [[Yes, I want youth insurance->Offer]]
  </Option>
  <Option key="isYouth"
          value="false"
  >
    [[No, I want regular insurance->Offer]]
  </Option>
</SelectAction>

passages.name: currentlyInsured
passages.text:
<Message>
  Are you already covered by a travel insurance?
</Message>

<Redirect to="[[errorSize]]"
          when="coInsured > 6"
>
</Redirect>

<SelectAction>
  <Option key="prevInsurance"
          value="contents"
  >
    [[Yes, I have travel insurance->insurerInput]]
  </Option>
  <Option key="prevInsurance"
          value="false"
  >
    [[No, I'm not covered->email]]
  </Option>
</SelectAction>

passages.name: insurerInput
passages.text:
<Message>
  What insurer do you have travel insurance with?
</Message>

<PreviousInsuranceProviderAction next="[[Continue->offer
]]"
                                 skip="[[Okay->email]]"
>
  <Tooltip>
    <Title>
      Current insurance
    </Title>
    <Description>
      Enter your current insurer and we can help make the process of switching to Hedvig easier!
    </Description>
  </Tooltip>
</PreviousInsuranceProviderAction>

passages.name: numberOfPeople
passages.text:
<Message>
  Nice. How many others would you like to be covered by the insurance?
</Message>

<Response>
  <when expression="coInsured == 1">
    Me + {coInsured} other
  </when>
  <when expression="coInsured > 1">
    Me + {coInsured} others
  </when>
  <when expression="coInsured == 0">
    Just me
  </when>
</Response>

<NumberAction placeholder="2"
              minvalue="0"
              key="coInsured"
              next="[[Continue->currentlyInsured]]"
              unit="other people (excl. myself)"
>
  <Tooltip>
    <Title>
      Number of co-insured
    </Title>
    <Description>
      E.g. partner, children or roomies that should be covered. Co-insured must live together with you to be covered by your insurance
    </Description>
  </Tooltip>
</NumberAction>

passages.name: Start
passages.text:
<Message>
  Hi! Let's get you an offer, it'll only take a minute
</Message>

<Message>
  First things first, what's your name?
</Message>

<TextActionSet next="[[Continue->birthDate]]">
  <TextAction title="First name"
              placeholder="Hedvig"
              large="true"
              key="firstName"
  >
  </TextAction>
  <TextAction title="Surname"
              placeholder="Hedvigsen"
              large="true"
              key="lastName"
  >
  </TextAction>
</TextActionSet>

passages.name: Offer
passages.text:
<Message>
  Great, your offer is ready!
</Message>

<GraphQLApi next="[[OfferSuccess]]">
  <Mutation>
    mutation CreateQuoteNorwegianTravel(
			$id: ID!
			$firstName: String!
			$lastName: String!
			$currentInsurer: String
			$birthDate: LocalDate!
			$coInsured: Int!
			$isYouth: Boolean!
		) {
		  createQuote(input: {
		  	id: $id,
			firstName: $firstName,
			lastName: $lastName,
			currentInsurer: $currentInsurer,
			birthDate: $birthDate,
			norwegianTravel: {
			  coInsured: $coInsured
			  isYouth: $isYouth
			}
		  }) {
			... on CompleteQuote {
			  id
			  insuranceCost {
				monthlyGross {
				  amount
				  currency
				}
				monthlyDiscount {
				  amount
				  currency
				}
				monthlyNet {
				  amount
				  currency
				}
			  }
			}
		  }
  	  	}
  </Mutation>
  <GeneratedVariable key="id"
                     type="uuid"
                     storeas="quoteId"
  >
  </GeneratedVariable>
  <Variable key="firstName"
            from="firstName"
            as="string"
  >
  </Variable>
  <Variable key="lastName"
            from="lastName"
            as="string"
  >
  </Variable>
  <Variable key="currentInsurer"
            from="currentInsurer"
            as="string"
  >
  </Variable>
  <Variable key="coInsured"
            from="coInsured"
            as="int"
  >
  </Variable>
  <Variable key="birthDate"
            from="birthDate"
            as="string"
  >
  </Variable>
  <Variable key="isYouth"
            from="isYouth"
            as="boolean"
  >
  </Variable>
  <Error next="[[CreateQuoteError]]">
  </Error>
  <Result key="createQuote.insuranceCost.monthlyGross.amount"
          as="monthlyGross"
  >
  </Result>
  <Result key="createQuote.insuranceCost.monthlyGross.currency"
          as="monthlyGrossCurrency"
  >
  </Result>
  <Result key="createQuote.insuranceCost.monthlyNet.amount"
          as="monthlyNet"
  >
  </Result>
  <Result key="createQuote.insuranceCost.monthlyNet.currency"
          as="monthlyNetCurrency"
  >
  </Result>
  <Result key="createQuote.insuranceCost.monthlyDiscount.amount"
          as="monthlyDiscount"
  >
  </Result>
  <Result key="createQuote.insuranceCost.monthlyDiscount.currency"
          as="monthlyDiscountCurrency"
  >
  </Result>
</GraphQLApi>
